name: Root Certificate Installed
description: Adversaries may install a root certificate on a compromised system to avoid warnings when connecting to adversary controlled web servers.
false_positives: Help Desk or IT may need to manually add a corporate Root CA on occasion. Need to test if GPO push doesn't trigger FP
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Aa][Dd][Dd].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\certutil.exe AND process.command_line:*\-addstore* AND process.command_line:*root*) OR (process.executable:*\\CertMgr.exe AND process.command_line:*\/add* AND process.command_line:*root*))`
